translations: n．赔偿，补偿：对损失、损害或伤害的补偿，通常是通过支付金钱或其他形式的补偿。
· The insurance company provided indemnifications for the damages caused by the flood.
保险公司为洪水造成的损失提供了赔偿。

sentences.sentence: Party B shall undertake the responsibilities of three (3) months rent and all damage expenses aside from insurance indemnifications .
sentences.translation: 乙方必须承担车辆丢失后原车型三个月的租赁费和保险公司赔偿后不足部分的车辆损失费。
